attributes.action: Create decent Housing for families with children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Create decent Housing for low income families with children.After reading some sad stories from a website,due to a shortage of housing,parents are being forced to rent run down homes off private landlords for very high fees that they struggle to pay, and then a mountain of bills,and councils taking the family to court because they cant keep up on council tax payments,you cannot expect someone who earns 12,000 per year to pay that all in rent.
